body:
## Expected Behavior

Be able to set the existing global `RefreshInterval` and `ExpirationChecks` variables via enviornment variable.

## Actual Behavior

These parameters do exist; https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/d7e24101f9581eef4128ee600952acd431f8326d/common/config/config.go#L116-L119

But are not settable via environment variable here: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/d7e24101f9581eef4128ee600952acd431f8326d/docker/config_template.yaml#L152-L153

As a result, I vendored the configuration file and updated it on my end.

I can throw a quick PR to this end, but would be great to get a üëç first
title: Certificate hot-reloading configurations are not settable via ENV var
